---
title: "dataset-visualizacion"
output: html_document
---
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r libraries}
library(ggplot2)
library(datasauRus)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r dataset}
datasaurus_dozen %>%
  group_by(dataset) %>%
  summarize(
    mean_x = mean(x),
    mean_y = mean(y),
    std_dev_x = sd(x),
    std_dev_y = sd(y),
    corr_x_y = cor(x, y)
  )
```

```{r plot, echo=FALSE}
ggplot(datasaurus_dozen, aes(x = x, y = y, colour = dataset))+
  geom_point() +
  theme_void() +
  theme(legend.position = "none")+
  facet_wrap(~dataset, ncol = 3)
```
